DOC.brief_summary: To conduct prospective , randomized trial compare efficacy group mindfulness-based intervention adapt social anxiety disorder ( MBI-SAD ) versus cognitive behavior group therapy ( CBGT ) .
DOC.brief_title: Mindfulness-based Intervention Versus CBT Social Anxiety Disorder
DOC.detailed_description: The main aim comparative trial determine MBI-SAD noninferior CBGT improve core symptom social anxiety disorder , depressive symptom , self , esteem , disability quality life . A secondary aim examine whether treatment gain maintain 6-month period . Exploratory aim study : 1 ) determine MBI-SAD enhances self-compassion mindfulness relative CBGT ; 2 ) determine change self-compassion mindfulness mediate clinical response MBI-SAD ; 3 ) explore moderator treatment response .
